title: Peptide - T when rxn is favored given dG dH dS

content.description: Two molecules of the amino acid glycine join through the formation of a peptide bond, as shown above. The thermodynamic data for the reaction are listed in the following table.
content.question: Under which of the following temperature conditions is the reaction thermodynamically favored?

choices.label: It is only favored at high temperatures.
It is only favored at low temperatures.
It is favored at all temperatures.
It is not favored at any temperature.

content.answer: It is not favored at any temperature.
